> Sep 11, 2024

# Patch 5.5: Lumiose

## Fire Shard

The chance to burn no longer increased after fire 2. With Fire 8, you'll receive a fire shard after each round

## Invisisble Ghosts

Ghost pokemons now have 25% dodge chance
